    • EIP712Domain

    Interface EIP712Domain

    EIP712Domain

    Description

    EIP-712 domain separator parameters that uniquely identify the signing context. These parameters prevent signature replay attacks across different contracts or chains.

    interface EIP712Domain {
        name: string;
        version: string;
        chainId: number;
        verifyingContract: string;
    }
